p: Under normal conditions, the kidney tissues of MT−/− and MT+/+ mice exhibit differences in sugar and lipid metabolism and ATP synthesis. Similar to the results of previous study 24, enzymes detected in heart tissues that are involved in lipid metabolism showed differences in MT−/− and MT+/+ mice. A genomics study by Miura et al. revealed 25 41 differentially expressed genes between the kidneys of MT−/− and MT+/+ mice, 11 of which were associated with energy metabolism.
